Text: Whyd it give me 103 files and only 1 avi file, 1 minute long?
They're called .rar files... use WinRar or 7Zip or something similar to unpack them.  Just try to unpack the .r00 one and the rest should unpack automatically.

A/8, V/6. It's a cam recording, but I've wanted to see this movie for awhile, so I was willing to put up with funky lighting and blurriness. This movie didn't get the best reviews, yet I like it a lot. Really enjoyed watching JG and AH together and liked the humor as well as the poignancy. Thank you for the download.
